pages.text: $(li)§cR§r: Opens the R-key menu which contains a lot of functions.$(li)§cU§r: Hover mouse over an item and press U to look up its usage in JEI$(li)§cP§r: Hover mouse over an item and press P to look up its recipe in JEI$(li)§cY§r: Hover over an item and press Y to look for the same item in nearby chests, the chest will give out smoke particles if found.$(li)§cDirection keys§r: Adjust the cam position in 3rd person mode.

$(li)§cM§r: Opens full-screen map$(li)§c~§r: Excavate blocks, View $(l:quick_start/excavation) for more info$(li)§cNumpad /§r: Toss item (Not Q) Hold to toss with more power.$(li)§cDEL§r: Hover over an item and press DEL to put it into the trash slot ($(5)Shift+DEL$(4) Deletes all items of the same type in you inventory$())$(li)§cAlt+Numpad DEL(.)§r: Toggles fluid display

$(li)§cF3 + A§r: Reloads all chunks$(li)§cF3 + S§r: Reloads sounds$(li)§cF8§r: BetterFoliage mod menu$(li)§cF7§r: Toggles real first person mod$(li)§cK§r: Opens skills menu$(li)§cB§r: Opens waypoint manager$(li)§cF3 + H§r: Show / hide advanced tooltips.

$(li)$(c)=$(): Zooms out minimap$(li)$(c)-$(): Zooms in minimap$(li)$(c)F6$(): Switch between 1st person and 3rd persons mode$(li)$(c)F5$(): Switch cam position of 3rd person mode$(li)$(c)Shift+Numpad-$(): Reloads ambient music, use this if you hear no background music playing for a long time.
